sentences.sContent: Stephen was regarded as an eligible bachelor.
sentences.sCn: 斯蒂芬被认为是一个钻石王老五。

synos.tran: 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的
合格者；适任者；有资格者

remMethod.val: e(出来) + lig(=lect选择) + ible → 能被选择出来的 → 合格的

trans.tranCn: 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的
trans.tranOther: someone who is eligible for something is able or allowed to do it, for example because they are the right age

trans.tranCn: 合格者；适任者；有资格者
